pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:7.1: “Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:8.1: Na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
